actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act by designating the Oregon Trail, located in portions of Missouri, Kansas, Nebraska, Wyoming, Idaho, Oregon and Washington, as a component of the National Trails System.

summary.text: Oregon National Historic Trail Act - Amends the National Trails System Act to establish the Oregon National Historic Trail within Federal lands located in Missouri, Kansas, Nebraska, Wyoming, Idaho, Oregon, and Washington. Provides for the inclusion of State, local, and privately-held lands. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to administer the lands designated under this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act by designating the Oregon Trail, located in portions of Missouri, Kansas, Nebraska, Wyoming, Idaho, Oregon and Washington, as a component of the National Trails System.
